post.author: 신덕현
post.content:
----------------------------------------------------------------------
[사이트 목록]
http://worksearch.gc.ca/english/index.pl - Worksearch (캐나다 정부가 운영)
http://www.canadajobs.com
http://www.netjobs.com/
http://www.canadiancareers.com/
http://www.headhunter.net/jobseeker/jobs/jobfindica.asp?ch=ICA
http://www.monster.com/ , http://www.occ.com/
http://www.brassring.com/
http://www.workopolis.com/
http://www.employmentnews.com/

----------------------------------------------------------------------
[사이트 보충설명]
http://worksearch.gc.ca/english/index.pl
- 캐나다 정부가 운영

http://www.canadajobs.com

http://www.netjobs.com/
netJobs offers you fast and easy job searching and resume posting.

http://www.canadiancareers.com/
CanadianCareers.com is one of the original career sites on the web for Canadians.  First online back in 1996 (then known as the Canadian Career Page), we have established a reputation for providing reliable career and employment information for Canadians from coast-to-coast.

http://www.headhunter.net/jobseeker/jobs/jobfindica.asp?ch=ICA
With over 250,000 job postings representing more than 10,000 of the nation's employers, Headhunter.net is the fastest growing job awareness site today. Headhunter.net is rated first among cross-industry, national online recruiting services in quality of results and user satisfaction. Its highly functional interface and dedication to customer service has earned Headhunter.net a reputation for dependability and results among job seekers and job posters.


http://www.monster.com/ , http://www.occ.com/

http://www.brassring.com/
Introducing BrassRing.com, a technology based information and career portal. BrassRing brings together the best resources for the high-tech professional. Formerly incpad by Westech, BrassRing changes the face of online recruiting by dramatically expanding the site's services while retaining its greatest strengths.

http://www.workopolis.com/
Canada's Biggest Job Site, now hosting over 31,000 Jobs.

http://www.employmentnews.com/
If you are looking to hire or be hired with your premiere career and job resource in the Greater Toronto Area as well as Ottawa, Ontario, Canada.
Our searchable resume database, career and training ads, and resume writing assistant are here to serve you.
post.title: 취업검색사이트 모음
